interfaces

Interface SubUrbInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RMI_Server_SubUrb

    public interface SubUrbInterface
extends java.rmi.Remote
    The SubUrbInterface provides the user with services to perform operations after access to the application, like report and user account operations, if logged
    Author:
    Nicola Landro, Luca Landa

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<Report> addObserver(java.lang.String observerID, RemoteObserver observer)
      Adds an observer for the SubUrbInterface instance, in order to receive suburb reports and report updates
      boolean closeReport(Report existingReport, User user, java.lang.String result)
      Closes a report actually in "in charge" state
      void exit(java.lang.String observerID, RemoteObserver observer)
      Notifies the server that the given observer is not listening for updates anymore
      boolean removeUser(User user)
      Deletes an user account from Watchneighbours server
      boolean sendReport(Report newReport)
      Sends a new report to Watchneighbours server
      boolean takeChargeOf(Report existingReport, User user)
      Takes charge of an existing report
      boolean updateProfile(User oldUser, User newUser)
      Updates a user account with new data

    • Method Detail

      • sendReport

        boolean sendReport(Report newReport)
            throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Sends a new report to Watchneighbours server
        Parameters:
        newReport - the new report created
        Returns:
        success if the new report data is correct
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if a connection issue occurred

      • takeChargeOf

        boolean takeChargeOf(Report existingReport,
                     User user)
              throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Takes charge of an existing report
        Parameters:
        existingReport - the report to take charge of
        user - the logged user which is taking charge of the report
        Returns:
        success of the operation, returns false if a server synchronizing issue occurred
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if a connection issue occurred

      • exit

        void exit(java.lang.String observerID,
          RemoteObserver observer)
   throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Notifies the server that the given observer is not listening for updates anymore
        Parameters:
        observerID - the observer's ID
        observer - the observer listening for updates
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if a connection issue occurred

      • updateProfile

        boolean updateProfile(User oldUser,
                      User newUser)
               throws WrongDataException,
                      java.rmi.RemoteException
        Updates a user account with new data
        Parameters:
        oldUser - the old user account to update
        newUser - the new user account updated
        Returns:
        success of the operation
        Throws:
        WrongDataException - if the updated account contains wrong data
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if a connection issue occurred

      • closeReport

        boolean closeReport(Report existingReport,
                    User user,
                    java.lang.String result)
             throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                    WrongDataException
        Closes a report actually in "in charge" state
        Parameters:
        existingReport - the report to close
        user - the user which is closing the report
        result - the report result
        Returns:
        success of the operation
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if a connection issue occurred
        WrongDataException - if the given result is not acceptable

      • addObserver

        java.util.ArrayList<Report> addObserver(java.lang.String observerID,
                                        RemoteObserver observer)
                                 throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Adds an observer for the SubUrbInterface instance, in order to receive suburb reports and report updates
        Parameters:
        observerID - the observed ID
        observer - the remote observer
        Returns:
        ArrayList with actual reports not closed yet for the specific suburb
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if a connection issue occurred

      • removeUser

        boolean removeUser(User user)
            throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Deletes an user account from Watchneighbours server
        Parameters:
        user - the user account
        Returns:
        success of the operation
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if a connection issue occurred
